proc append(mpd: var MultipartData; attachments: seq[Attachment];
            pl: var JsonNode; is_interaction = false) {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, RequesterError, IOError, ValueError],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect], forbids: [].}
Appends discord attachment items to multipart data. Internal use only, but you can use it if you want. Source   Edit

    ...raises: [RequesterError, IOError, ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect],
    forbids: [].}
Appends discord file items to multipart data. Internal use only, but you can use it if you want. Source   Edit   
proc request(api: RestApi; meth, endpoint: string; pl, audit_reason = "";
             mp: MultipartData = nil; auth = true): Future[JsonNode] {.
    ...stackTrace: false, raises: [Exception, ValueError], tags: [RootEffect,
    TimeEffect, ReadDirEffect, ReadEnvEffect, ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect],
    forbids: [].}
Makes HTTP requests to the Discord API.
  • pl - stringified json payload.
  • audit_reason - audit log reason for any action
  • mp - multipart data which is used to attach files
  • auth - if authentication is needed.
  • meth - method of http request. definitely not illegal ;).
